thread.section_title: Myer Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Myer | www.myer.com.au
thread.title: Kate Hoskins

author: Kate Hoskins
title: Kate Hoskins
text:
My partner and I drove from Byron Bay to Robina to do some shopping yesterday. Although I had not intended to buy any clothes, I tried on some items and experienced wonderful service from Judy and Sandy in the Womens' Wear department. They were helpful, kind, informative and fun., working well together and individually. As a result I spent over $800 in this department. My partner also made several clothing purchases. As a gay couple we are not always treated with respect, but your staff were genuine, warm and accepting. I would highly commend Sandy and Judy as they exceeded all expectations of great service. Please pass on our thanks.
I tried to submit a review yesterday but the page became lost so I'm not certain it was sent successfully.
Kind regards
Kate Hoskins
